Title: Grenades For Missile Launchers
Description:
A small mod that allows missile launchers to load and fire grenades in addition to HE missiles. The missile launcher has also had its accuracy improved and been moved to tier 5 to differentiate it from the grenade launcher.

Other weapons which can be loaded with HE missile are unchanged.

The code is stored on [url=https://github.com/Gearlink0/GrenadesForMissileLaunchers]Github[/url], if you are interested.
